song.title: Break Space
song.info:
The song has been _entirely_ made on ZX81 with ZXpand and two YM/AY chips (6 channels) from ZXpand-AY and Mr-X sound-modules.
Software used: ZX81 SoundTracker and TurboSound Player - both by Andy Rea.
Recorded from real ZX81 computer.
Thx a lot for all the soft/hardware to: Sasha2000, SirMorris, Andy Rea and Moggy (for software-ports for more stupid users like me).
